String.string: He'll hide behind his soldiers, so save your strength!
The honor is yours, my friend.
Eliminate Iknephar Chief Priest Marineu in Agonal Hall. [You must select Labyrinth of Terror (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:253#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Report to Centurion Amarvand at the Furnace Approach.
